Version 0.91: Add counter to avoid sms filter in recipient phone
- Your number appears as sender in recipient\'s phone
- Pop-up when you reach limit number of SMS, typically 100 sms per hour
We are working to fix these issues
This app is for fun. Flood your friends Inbox with SMS in a short period with no restrictions in number of SMS that can be sent to the same mobile number. Perfect if you have an unlimited plan.
Type a name or number: a recipient, if you want to send to multiple recipients, click the behind button.
Type a SMS: Type message content.
Message count: Number of SMS to be bombed.
